channel.title: SMF 99 Subtype 12 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 99 Subtype 12 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - cec_capacity_used
item.description: CEC capacity used in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM inter… Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CECCAPUSEDADJ Description CEC capacity used in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length @OA37736C

item.title: Field - cec_capacity_used_ms
item.description: CEC capacity used in microseconds @OA37736C Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CECCAPUSED

item.title: Field - cec_free_capacity
item.description: Free CEC capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM inter… Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CECCAPFREE Description Free CEC capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length @OA37736C

item.title: Field - cec_utilization
item.description: Total CEC utilization, scaled by 256 @OA37736C Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CECUTIL Post-Processed The value is scaled by 25600.

item.title: Field - cpu_total
item.description: number of VH, VM and VL processors Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: cpu_vh, cpu_vm, cpu_vl Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return cpu_vh + cpu_vm + cpu_vl

item.title: Field - cpu_type
item.description: SMF99.12 capacity data processor type @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: hd_int_cap_proctype Post-Processed The source values (SMF) are mapped in IBM SMF Explorer as follows: Source value IBM SMF Explorer meaning 1 CP 2 zAAP 3 zIIP default No Processor

item.title: Field - cpu_vh
item.description: Number VHs @OA37736C Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CPUHI

item.title: Field - cpu_vl
item.description: Number VLs @OA37736C Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CPULO

item.title: Field - cpu_vm
item.description: Number of VMs @OA37736C Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CPUMED

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99DTE

item.title: Field - dln
item.description: Length of the data section Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99DLN

item.title: Field - dof
item.description: Offset to the data section from the beginning of the record (including… Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99DOF Description Offset to the data section from the beginning of the record (including RDW)

item.title: Field - don
item.description: Number of data sections Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99DON

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: Date when the record was moved into the SMF buffer, in the form 0cyydd… Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99DTE Description Date when the record was moved into the SMF buffer, in the form 0cyydddF.

item.title: Field - flg
Field - hd_action_explanation
item.description: Action taken by HiperDispatch Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity, hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl, hd_action_unpark, hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity, hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping, hd_action_unpark_capping, hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low, hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping, hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used, hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used, hd_action_park_small_utilization, hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping, hd_action_park, hd_action_park_capping Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: hd_action_unpark_filter = ~hd_action_unpark hd_action_unpark_capping_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_capping hd_action_park_filter= ~hd_action_park hd_action_park_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_capping hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity_filter= ~hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl_filter= ~hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_filter= ~hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used_filter= ~hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used_filter= ~hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used hd_action_park_small_utilization_filter= ~hd_action_park_small_utilization hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping hd_action_explanation = hd_action_unpark.where(hd_action_unpark, '') hd_action_explanation = hd_action_explanation.where(hd_action_unpark_filter, 'Unpark') hd_action_explanation = hd_action_explanation.

item.title: Field - hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity
item.description: Less than 25% of CP free, no unparking Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: mvs_busy, vcm_mvsbusythrunpark, cec_free_capacity Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: condition1 = mvs_busy >= vcm_mvsbusythrunpark condition2 = cec_free_capacity <= (2e6 * vcm_mvsbusythrunpark / 1600) return condition1 & condition2

item.title: Field - hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl
Field - hd_action_park
item.description: Allow at least 2 VL that have effectiveness, parking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecrefflowthr, vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecrefflowthr & vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_park_capping
item.description: Allow at least 2 VL that have effectiveness, parking done during capping Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecrprsmcapvhutil, vcm_diagdecrprsmcapeffectthr, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecrprsmcapvhutil & vcm_diagdecrprsmcapeffectthr & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used
item.description: Only 10% above guaranteed is used, parking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecreffectsmall, vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Description Only 10% above guaranteed is used. One VL is parked Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecreffectsmall & vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used
item.description: Only 4% above guaranteed capacity is used, parking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecreffectnone, vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Description Only 4% above guaranteed capacity is used. 50% of VLs are parked, at least one VL is parked Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecreffectnone & vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low
item.description: MVS busy threshold is low, parking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecrbusythr, vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecrbusythr & vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping
item.description: MVS busy threshold is low, parking done during capping Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecrprsmcapbusythr, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecrprsmcapbusythr & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_park_small_utilization
item.description: Less than 20% of VM/VL capacity is used, parking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecreffectthr, vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Description Less than 20% of VM/VL capacity is used, parking done, VH exists Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecreffectthr & vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping
item.description: Less than 20% of VM/VL capacity is used, parking done during capping Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecrprsmcapeffectthr, vcm_diagdecrprsmcap, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Description Less than 20% of VM/VL capacity is used, parking done during capping, VH exists Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecrprsmcapeffectthr & vcm_diagdecrprsmcap & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_unpark
item.description: MVS busy is higer than threshold, unparking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagincrdiscruprequ, vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark Description MVS busy is higer than threshold and free capacity is available, unparking done Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagincrdiscruprequ & vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark

item.title: Field - hd_action_unpark_capping
item.description: MVS busy is higer than threshold, unparking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecrprsmcapvhutil, vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark Description MVS busy is higer than threshold and free capacity is available, unparking done during capping Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecrprsmcapvhutil & vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark

item.title: Field - hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity
item.description: MVS busy is higer than threshold, unparking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagincrunusedcap, vcm_diagincrdiscruprequ, vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark Description MVS busy is higer than threshold and not enough free capacity available. Partiotions white space is used, unparking done Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagincrunusedcap & vcm_diagincrdiscruprequ & vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark

item.title: Field - hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping
item.description: MVS busy is higer than threshold, unparking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagincrunusedcap, vcm_diagdecrprsmcapvhutil, vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark Description MVS busy is higer than threshold and not enough free capacity available. Partiotions white space is used, unparking done during capping Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagincrunusedcap & vcm_diagdecrprsmcapvhutil & vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark

item.title: Field - hd_int_cap_length
item.description: Length of capacity data section @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_CAP_LENGTH

item.title: Field - hd_int_cap_number
item.description: Number of capacity data sections @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_CAP_NUMBER

item.title: Field - hd_int_cap_offset
item.description: Offset to capacity data section @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_CAP_OFFSET

item.title: Field - hd_int_cap_proctype
item.description: SMF99.12 capacity data processor type @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_HD_INT_CAP_PROCTYPE

item.title: Field - hd_int_hdr_length
item.description: Length of header data section @ME14601C Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_HDR_LENGTH

item.title: Field - hd_int_hdr_number
item.description: Number of header data sections @ME14601C Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_HDR_NUMBER

item.title: Field - hd_int_hdr_offset
item.description: Offset to header data section @ME14601C Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_HDR_OFFSET

item.title: Field - hd_int_proc_idx
item.description: HiperDispatch interval processor index @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_PROC_MAP Based on: SMF99C_HD_INT_PROC_IDX

item.title: Field - hd_int_proc_length
item.description: Length of processor data section @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_PROC_LENGTH

item.title: Field - hd_int_proc_number
item.description: Number of processor data sections @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_PROC_NUMBER

item.title: Field - hd_int_proc_offset
item.description: Offset to processor data section @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_PROC_OFFSET

item.title: Field - hd_request
item.description: Action taken by HiperDispatch Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity, hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl, hd_action_unpark, hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity, hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping, hd_action_unpark_capping, hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low, hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping, hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used, hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used, hd_action_park_small_utilization, hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping, hd_action_park, hd_action_park_capping Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: hd_action_unpark_filter = ~hd_action_unpark hd_action_unpark_capping_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_capping hd_action_park_filter= ~hd_action_park hd_action_park_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_capping hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity_filter= ~hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl_filter= ~hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_filter= ~hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used_filter= ~hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used_filter= ~hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used hd_action_park_small_utilization_filter= ~hd_action_park_small_utilization hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping hd_request = hd_action_unpark.where(hd_action_unpark, '') hd_request = hd_request.where(hd_action_unpark_filter, 'Unpark') hd_request = hd_request.

item.title: Sample - hiper_dispatch
item.description: Request hiper dispatch information per processor type. Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format len SMF99LEN Record Length. This field and the next field (total of four bytes) for… integer flg flag SMF99FLG System indicator: Bit 0 reserved, Bit 1 subtypes utilized, Bit 2 reser… string stu flg Subtypes utilized stu virtual flg Subtypes utilized rty SMF99RTY Record type 99 integer date SMF99DTE Date of Record date time SMF99TME Time of Record time timestamp virtual time

item.title: Field - lccadsf2
item.description: Processor Flag 1 @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_PROC_MAP Based on: SMF99C_LCCADSF2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description lccapark 1 Processor parked @ME14601A

item.title: Field - lccapark
item.description: Processor parked @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_PROC_MAP Based on: lccadsf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field lccadsf2.

item.title: Field - lccappnd
item.description: Processor park request pending @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_PROC_MAP Based on: lccascfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field lccascfl.

item.title: Field - lccascfl
item.description: Processor Flag 2 @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_PROC_MAP Based on: SMF99C_LCCASCFL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description lccappnd 7 Processor park request pending @ME14601A

item.title: Field - len
item.description: Record Length. This field and the next field (total of four bytes) for… Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99LEN Description Record Length. This field and the next field (total of four bytes) form the RDW (record descriptor word).

item.title: Field - lpar_busy
item.description: Used LPAR capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM inte… Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: lpar_capacity_used, cpu_total Description Used LPAR capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return lpar_capacity_used / cpu_total / 20000

item.title: Field - lpar_busy_projected
item.description: Projected MvsBusy, scaled by 16 @OA37736C Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_MVSBUSYPROJECTED Post-Processed The value is scaled by 16.

item.title: Field - lpar_cap_used_non_guaranteed
item.description: Used capacity of the non-guaranteed capacity (partially VM and unparke… Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPUSEDDISCR Description Used capacity of the non-guaranteed capacity (partially VM and unparked VLs) in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length @OA37736C

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_allocated
item.description: Allocated LPAR capcacity in microseconds. The allocated capacity is pr… Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPALLOC Description Allocated LPAR capcacity in microseconds. The allocated capacity is provided by the guaranteed capacity on VHs and VMs, plus extra capacity on VMs and unparked VLs @OA37736C

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_guaranteed
item.description: Guaranteed LPAR capcacity in microseconds. This value is calculated fr… Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPGUARAN Description Guaranteed LPAR capcacity in microseconds. This value is calculated from the physical processor share of this LPAR. @OA37736C

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_guaranteed_vm
item.description: Guaranteed LPAR capacity on VMs in microseconds @OA37736C Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPMEDGUARAN

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_non_guaranteed
item.description: Non guaranteed LPAR capacity in microseconds @OA37736C Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPNONGUARAN

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_share_unused
item.description: Unused capacity share for this LPAR in microseconds @OA37736A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARUNUSEDCAPSHARE

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_unused
item.description: Unused LPAR capacity in microseconds, including the unused capacity sh… Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARUNUSEDCAP Description Unused LPAR capacity in microseconds, including the unused capacity share for this LPAR @OA37736A

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_used
item.description: Used LPAR capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM inte… Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPUSEDADJ Description Used LPAR capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_used_vh
item.description: Used VH capacity of previous interval in microseconds @ME26914A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPUSEDVHADJ

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_used_vm_vl
item.description: Used capacity on VMs and VLs, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval l… Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPUSEDVMVL Description Used capacity on VMs and VLs, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length @OA37736C

item.title: Field - mt_badrv_ready_for_mt
item.description: HiperDispatch is now ready for MT mode switches Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: mt_flag1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field mt_flag1.

item.title: Field - mt_cf
item.description: Capacity factor of processor class. Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_MT_CF Description Scaled by 1024

item.title: Field - mt_curr
item.description: MT mode currently in use Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_MT_CURR

item.title: Field - mt_flag1
item.description: 1st MT flag byte Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99C_MT_FLAG1 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description mt_badrv_ready_for_mt 4 HiperDispatch is now ready for MT mode switches mt_multicpuspercore 1 Multiple CPUs defined within a CPU Core mt_procascore 0 Processor resource is viewed as a CPU core

item.title: Field - mt_flag2
item.description: 2nd MT flag byte Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99C_MT_FLAG2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description mt_modechgduetosupmt1_pend 4 MT mode change is pending due to supervisor request mt_modechgduetowaitcmp_pend 3 MT mode change is pending due to Wait completion status change mt_modechgduetohismt_pend 2 MT mode change is pending due to HISMT recovery mt_sup_recovery_pend 1 The supervisor requested MT reconfiguration is pending mt_modechgduetostsi_pend 0 MT mode change is pending due to STSI

item.title: Field - mt_mcf
item.description: Maximum capacity factor of processor class. Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_MT_MCF Description Scaled by 1024

item.title: Field - mt_modechgduetohismt_pend
item.description: MT mode change is pending due to HISMT recovery Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: mt_flag2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field mt_flag2.

item.title: Field - mt_modechgduetostsi_pend
item.description: MT mode change is pending due to STSI Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: mt_flag2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field mt_flag2.

item.title: Field - mt_modechgduetosupmt1_pend
item.description: MT mode change is pending due to supervisor request Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: mt_flag2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field mt_flag2.

item.title: Field - mt_modechgduetowaitcmp_pend
item.description: MT mode change is pending due to Wait completion status change Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: mt_flag2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field mt_flag2.

item.title: Field - mt_multicpuspercore
item.description: Multiple CPUs defined within a CPU Core Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: mt_flag1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field mt_flag1.

item.title: Field - mt_opt_inuse
item.description: MT mode value as forced by environment Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_MT_OPT_INUSE

item.title: Field - mt_opt_orig
item.description: MT mode value Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_MT_OPT_ORIG

item.title: Field - mt_procascore
item.description: Processor resource is viewed as a CPU core Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: mt_flag1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field mt_flag1.

item.title: Field - mt_sup_recovery_pend
item.description: The supervisor requested MT reconfiguration is pending Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: mt_flag2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field mt_flag2.

item.title: Field - mt_tgt
item.description: MT mode target value Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_MT_TGT

item.title: Field - mvs_busy
item.description: Average CPU usage scaled by 16 @OA37736C Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_MVSBUSY Post-Processed The value is scaled by 16.

item.title: Field - pflg
Field - pln
item.description: Length of the product section Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99PLN

item.title: Field - pnm
item.description: Product Name - SRM Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99PNM

item.title: Field - pof
item.description: Offset to the product section from the beginning of the record (includ… Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99POF Description Offset to the product section from the beginning of the record (including RDW)

item.title: Field - pon
item.description: Number of product sections Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99PON

item.title: Field - reasm_indicator
Field - record_incomplete
Field - rty
item.description: Record type 99 Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99RTY

item.title: Field - rvn
item.description: Record Version Number Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99RVN

item.title: Field - sdef_len
item.description: Length of self definition section Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99_SDEF_LEN

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: Segment descriptor (see record length field) Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99SEG

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: System ID Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99SID Description System identification (from the SID parameter).

item.title: Field - slv
item.description: System level from which record was cut (copied from CVTPRODN) Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99SLV

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name from which record was cut (copied from CVTSNAME) Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99SNM

item.title: Field - ssid
item.description: Sub System Identification Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99SSID

item.title: Field - stu
item.description: Subtypes utilized Record: SMF99S12 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - tid
item.description: Record subtype (must be at offset ‘16’X) Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99TID

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Time Stamp Record: SMF99S12 Based on: time, date Description Timestamp from SMF data. Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: Time since midnight, in hundreths of a second, that the record was mov… Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99TME Description Time since midnight, in hundreths of a second, that the record was moved into the SMF buffer

item.title: Field - vcm_cectotunusedcap

item.title: Field - vcm_diag204_flags
item.description: Flags @OA37736C Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_DIAG204_FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description vcm_d204_phwgtisneg 3 Phantom weight type vcm_d204_waitcompletion 2 WaitCompletion vcm_d204_lparcapping 1 LPAR capped by customer @ME14601A vcm_d204_wlmcapping 0 LPAR capped by WLM @ME14601A

item.title: Field - vcm_diagcapdecr
item.description: Capacity decrease flags Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_DIAGCAPDECR Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description vcm_diagdecrprsmcap 15 PR/SM capped LPAR: Adjust capacity decrease @ME26914A vcm_diagdecrprsmcapbusythr 14 PR/SM capped LPAR: MVS busy too low @ME26914A vcm_diagdecrprsmcapeffectthr 13 PR/SM capped LPAR: VL effect too low @ME26914A vcm_diagdecrprsmcapvhutil 12 PR/SM capped LPAR: Vh utilization is low @ME26914A vcm_diagdecrprsmcapcecutil 11 PR/SM capped LPAR: Park all. High CEC utilization and there is no unus… vcm_diagdecrprsmcapparkallhw 10 PR/SM capped LPAR.

item.title: Field - vcm_diagcapdecr_cont
Field - vcm_diagcapincr
item.description: Capacity increase flags @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_DIAGCAPINCR Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description vcm_diagincrprsmcapvhutil 6 PR/SM capped LPAR: Unpark requested because of high VH utilization @ME… vcm_diagincrunusedcap 5 unpark requested because the LPAR capacity is below the guaranteed cap… vcm_diagincrdiscrupallrq 3 Unpark all request @OA26789C vcm_diagincrdiscruprequ 2 Unpark request vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark 1 Adjust capacity increase by unparking a processor vcm_diagincr 0 Adjust capacity increase @ME14601A

item.title: Field - vcm_diagdecr
item.description: Adjust capacity decrease Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagcapdecr Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field vcm_diagcapdecr.

item.title: Field - vcm_flag1
item.description: HD 1st flag byte @OA37736A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_FLAG1 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description vcm_procspeedchg 4 processor speed change @OA37736A vcm_topochg_wuqe 3 dispatcher WUQ error @OA37736A vcm_topochg_hp 2 honor priority has changed @OA37736A vcm_rebuildans 1 rebuild affinity nodes @OA37736A vcm_topochanged 0 topology has changed @OA37736A

item.title: Field - vcm_flag2
item.description: HD 2nd flag byte @OA37736A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_FLAG2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description vcm_transition 6 VCM is transitioning to/from vertical @OA37736A vcm_ptf_switched 5 PTF was issued to initiate a switch into the opposite mode. However, t… vcm_mpwq_updated 4 dispatcher affinity was updated @OA37736A vcm_old_state 2 old VCM state @OA37736A vcm_lparcapvalid 1 LPAR capacities are valid @OA37736A vcm_ceccapvalid 0 CEC capacities are valid @OA37736A

item.title: Field - vcm_flag3
item.description: HD 3rd flag byte @OA37736A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_FLAG3 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description vcm_smf_topochg 6 Write TopoChg section @OA37736A vcm_newconttle 4 new container TLE @OA37736A vcm_cmset_active 3 Cross memory set @OA37736A vcm_lpardedicps 2 LPAR has only dedicated CPUs/Cores vcm_ifafac 1 IFA facility installed @OA37736A vcm_topofac 0 topology facility installed @OA37736A

item.title: Field - vcm_flag4
item.description: HD 4th flag byte @OA37736A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_FLAG4 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description vcm_old_sup_hp 1 SUP honor priority state of previous interval @OA37736A vcm_old_ifa_hp 0 IFA honor priority state of previous interval @OA37736A
